Return Policy:
=================
We offer our customers 6 months return policy . That is, if you are not satisfied with what we deliver to you, you may ask for refund or exchange within 90 days.

Shipping and Handling !

We Ship via The Following (DHL, UPS, FedEx) and Delivery takes Only 2days to get to your doorstep after Ship out we issue Out Documents For Shipments Confirmation such as (Air Way Bill, Shippers Receipt, Shippers Tracking Number ) so you can trace and monitor your package online before it gets to your door step.
